entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 7:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
